ModMetaData.name: Plant Growth Sync (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Neceros
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Neceros mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2084148729
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/PlantGrowthSync][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Synchronize your crop fields over time, so as to eventually force them to mature at the same time. Growth sync only applies to crops in your growing zones.
Includes a mod settings menu to customize your experience.
[b]Sorry, but I'm no longer maintaining my mods. Maybe in the future[/b] [i]Please note 99% of my mods are MIT licensed, meaning you can do whatever you want with it with the requirement of crediting me.[/i]
[b]Plant growth amount:[/b] Indicates how much each plant is averaged amongst each other. The larger this is the more each plant is sync per each time. [b]Growth sync time:[/b] Change how often the game tries to sync plants.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/ldroDjl.png[/img]
Originally by [b]Lanilor[/b]. Updated by [b]Neceros[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/2Zpv4mk.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NpuFU7v.png[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/s3KRLlu.gif[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
